ED_Title: Document considered by the General Assembly in connection with the question of social development
ED_DecisionText:
At its 73rd meeting, on 19 December 2017, the General Assembly, on the recommendation of the Third Committee,  took note of the note by the Secretariat transmitting an overview of the report entitled “World Social Situation 2017: promoting inclusion through social protection” submitted under the item entitled “Social development”.


(See A/72/431, para. 40; A/72/PV.73)
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/72/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
